property.name: Rules
property.value: At end of combat, if Kjeldoran Home Guard attacked or blocked this combat, put a -0/-1 counter on Kjeldoran Home Guard and create a 0/1 white Deserter creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2. {2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them send their legions! I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords." - General Varchild

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. If it's a creature, put a +0/+1 counter on it for each 1 damage prevented this way at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew!" - Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}{U}: Look at the top five cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and exile the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once great literature - now great litter." - Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the knowledge of Lat-Nam could not protect its sages from the Brothers' War." - Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Elite Guard. Activate only during combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The winged helms of the guard are put on for pageants - but taken off for war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}, Exile the top card of your library: Tap target creature with flying. {U}, Exile the top card of your library: If the exiled card is a snow land, Storm Elemental gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a Swamp: Destroy target nonartifact creature. It can't be regenerated. {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a snow Swamp: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all of Terisiare's flooding was natural . . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a necromancer would create such a foul form of divination." - Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Insidious Bookworms dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The so-called barbarians will not respect us for our military might - they will respect us for our honor." - Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Binding Grasp unless you pay {1}{U}. You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What I want, I take." - Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments, victory was mine." - Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never underestimate the power of the soul unleashed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Death Spark deals 1 damage to any target. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target noncreature artifact with mana value X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Frankly, destruction is best left to professionals." - Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Iceberg enters the battlefield with X ice counters on it. {3}: Put an ice counter on Iceberg. Remove an ice counter from Iceberg: Add {C}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Counter target spell that targets Mistfolk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Although my official log will state there is no evidence pointing to the existence of the mistfolk, my certainty is lessened by the cursed consistency of the expedition's eyewitness accounts." - Disa the Restless, journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no time for pain when this beast leaves its terrible sting." - Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order advocate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Enchanted creature has first strike as long as it's blocking and you control a snow land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me wings to fly and speed to strike. In return, the glory I earn shall be yours." - Steinar Icefist, Balduvian shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever." - Zur the Enchanter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {B}: Return Ashen Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep and only if three or more creature cards are above Ashen Ghoul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Will not the mountains quake and hills melt at the coming of the darkness? Share this vision with your enemies, Lim-Dûl, and they shall wither." - Leshrac, Walker of Night

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due." - Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Drift of the Dead's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take their dead, and entomb them in the snow. Risen, they shall serve a new purpose." - Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Gangrenous Zombies: Gangrenous Zombies deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you control a snow Swamp, Gangrenous Zombies deals 2 damage to each creature and each player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kjeldoran Dead enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. {B}: Regenerate Kjeldoran Dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They shall kill those whom once they loved." - Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Snow swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the faces of my dead friends among that grim band, and I can bear no more." - Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only black and/or red mana on X. Soul Burn deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description." - Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn. {B}{B}{R}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature. {R}{G}{G}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How did I ever let myself get talked into this project?" - Toothlicker Harj, orcish captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One aurochs may feed a village, but a herd will flatten it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R}. {R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mammoths may be good to ride on, but they're certainly bad to fall off of!" - Disa the Restless, journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Giant Trap Door Spider and target creature without flying that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So large and so quiet - a combination best avoided." - Disa the Restless, journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For those of courage, even the sky holds no limit." - Arnjlot Olasson, sky mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target snow land is no longer snow. {2}, {T}: Target nonsnow basic land becomes snow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let any who doubt the evil of using the ancient devices look at this infernal machine. What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?" - Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 3 or less gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's no ornithopter, but then I'm no Urza." - Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist
